title: sAmi ninnE kOriyunnadirA (varNa)
sahitya:
sAmi ninnE kOriyunnadirA mA sArasAkSi nIkaina cinnadirA


anupallavi

  shrIman mahA mEru samAna dhIruDaina shrI ugra pANDya bhUpAla gAnalOla
			(svara sAhityam)
nI neratanamunakA nE pogaDa jAlanu sadAmadini ninnu dalaci cAlatami mIri tODitemma
nEnurA - parAkujEya tagadurA nijamu palgitinirA ika birAna rArA dhIrA sukumArA naravara


caraNam    nI rAgAneduru jUcu cunnadirA
			(ciTTaisvara sAhityams)
1:  nIve ghana yOgashAlivi nIvE rasika shikhAmaNiyani cAlavini
 caraNam 2    Ata pATapallu nIdu kuluku mari jUDu palukulaku mEdi mikala ala bOdika 
nimiSavatuDu lella sari sATiyu kArani nAdi palguTunu
 caraNam 3    karakamadiya kumAruni saramula kedari bedari badari virahamunu tapana kiraNamu kalasi taruni ninu dalaci
4:  pApAtmuDaku mAruni bOdhanaku lObaDi vaccina malaya mArutuDu tanakAptuDau
 yanaru nI guNamunu cEkonanu sukhakaramulaina mrgamadAdi suma sugandhamul hitavu
 lEdanu cunu saiyapai poralusu sArekanu ninnu madilO tALacu cunna celi
